results.title: Uus Laine
results.content: Uus Laine is a vibrant social club and event venue in the heart of Tallinn. Known for its eclectic cultural program, we organize live music, film nights,
results.raw_content:
# 

# More than just a bar. A place where culture, music and¬† community come together.

## Uus Laine is a vibrant social club and event venue in the heart of Tallinn. Known for its eclectic cultural program, we organize live music, film nights, DJ sets and engaging discussions. Whether you are looking for atmosphere, a great cocktail or our lively community events, Uus Laine is the place to connect, create and celebrate. We offer a diverse cultural program: A social club where creative and open-minded people meet. Our program is as diverse as our guests ‚Äì international bands, DJ programs, community events and a lively conversation culture. Concerts, film nights, book presentations, art exhibitions and club parties.

# Events Calender

## **Nov. 8, 2025** Villu 62 - Tallinn / J.M.K.E / Nova Lux Tickets --- **Nov. 14, 2025** LAINE LIVE: Roovel Oobik + Vana Tickets --- **Nov. 19, 2025**[LAINE LIVE: Jonah Parzen-Johnson (USA)¬† & Berke Can √ñzcan (TR)](https://www.facebook.com/events/773637678984138) [Tickets](https://www.piletitasku.ee/et/event/8896) --- [**Nov. 22, 2025**LAINE KLUBI√ñ√ñ: MAGNUS BLOMKVIST, JAAKKO KESTIL√Ñ, ERKIN ANTOV, RENNO PAAT & OTT KELPMAN](https://www.facebook.com/events/2546007215770300) [Info](https://www.facebook.com/events/2546007215770300) --- **Nov. 27, 2025** [LAINE LIVE: Jaan](https://www.facebook.com/events/721880844258392) Pehk [Tickets](https://www.piletitasku.ee/et/event/8903)

## **Nov. 28, 2025** [LAINE LIVE: reket](https://www.facebook.com/events/1127017019016877) & allu [Tickets](https://www.piletitasku.ee/et/event/8725)

## **Nov. 9, 2025** LAINE PLAADITURG.XTRA [Info](https://www.facebook.com/events/815998600932406)

# 

# Bar & Kitchen

# Art Deco that surprises the taste buds. Describe what you love - our bartenders will create an experience just for you. World flavors in one place offering high-quality and healthy food.

# 

# Book yourself a nice evening

# Making a table reservation is quick and easy. Choose the right event and the size of your group,¬† confirm your contact details, and we'll take care of the rest. If you have any special requests ‚Äî for example,¬† regarding food, drinks,¬†or a separate room ‚Äî let us know. Our goal is to make your evening memorable.

# 

# 

# Partners & Cooperation

## 

# Collaboration for culture! We are open to partnerships: in the fields of art exhibitions, music performances,¬† cocktail evenings and design projects. If you have an idea that fits our vision.

## 

# 

# Who is behind the remote¬† control of this party?

# 

# 

# FAQs

## What time does Uus Laine open?

## The club is open: Mon-Thu 17:00‚Äì23:00. Fri-Sat 17:00‚Äì02:00. Sun 12:00‚Äì23:00.

## Is table reservation necessary?

## We recommend booking a table in advance, especially on weekends and during popular events, to ensure a seat.

## How much does admission to the club cost? Admission prices vary depending on the event. Some events are free, while others may require a ticket.

## What kind of events are organized at Uus Laine? Our program includes live concerts, film nights, book presentations, art exhibitions and club parties.

## 

# 

## 

## Subscribe to our newsletter and always stay on top of the latest news: Be the first to know about new flavors, concerts and exclusive offers. Stay up to date with everything that will help you enjoy a fulfilling and memorable cultural experience.

# [MONO](/artists/201140-mono)

![ilia-33‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/172851198/medium_avatar "ilia-33")
![robiW‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/184975138/medium_avatar "robiW")
![saber-kordestanchi‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/134732234/medium_avatar "saber-kordestanchi")
![MONO](//assets.sk-static.com/images/default_images/large_avatar/default-artist.png)
![Venue](//assets.sk-static.com/images/default_images/large_avatar/default-artist.png)


![Reviews](//assets.sk-static.com/images/default_images/large_avatar/default-artist.png)

## Line-up

![MONO Concert Tickets - 2025 Tour Dates.]()
![Chevron right icon]()

## Venue

## Related upcoming events

![Marcos Valle Concert Tickets - 2025 Tour Dates](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/artists/5852/medium_avatar)

## Live reviews

MONO - not to be confused with the Irish rock band, who don‚Äôt stylise their name in all capitals like this particular outfit - are one of the most important post-rock bands in Japanese history; over the course of a colourful fifteen year career to date, they‚Äôve released six studio albums, each of which has played with the boundaries of their genre in its own unique way. Their most recent record, For My Parents, met with some of the strongest reviews of the group‚Äôs career, and confirmed them as one of the few instrumental rock bands that have genuinely evolved with each release to date; they might hail from Tokyo, but they‚Äôre very much in thrall to Western shoegaze and ambient bands. Their live shows, too, have been a major part in reinforcing their formidable reputation; they‚Äôre incredibly atmospheric affairs that use the volume dial like a weapon, capable of swinging from one sonic extreme to the other in the blink of an eye. Later this month, they‚Äôll make their UK return at the ArcTangent festival in Bristol, after a two year absence; expect a genuinely incendiary affair, with a moody light show, impressively technical guitar work and atmosphere by the truckload all present and correct.

![Joeg_67‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/10085298/medium_avatar)

results.title: MONO, Tallinn, December 1, 2025, 19:00, Tickets ‚Äì www.livenation.ee
results.content: On December 1, 2025, the legendary Japanese instrumental rock band MONO will bring their breathtaking soundscapes to Paavli Kultuurivabrik in Tallinn.
results.raw_content:
![Site logo - www.livenation.ee - go to homepage](https://networksites.livenationinternational.com/networksites/lbxlwtw5/ln-logo-primary-red-40px.svg)

# MONO

# Mon, 01 Dec 2025

[Paavli Kultuurivabrik,](/en/paavli-kultuurivabrik-tickets-vdp1421164) Tallinn

Doors: 7:00 PM

## Tickets

## General Onsale

## Info

On December 1, 2025, the legendary Japanese instrumental rock band MONO will bring their breathtaking soundscapes to Paavli Kultuurivabrik in Tallinn. Known for their seamless fusion of orchestral grandeur and shoegaze-infused guitar noise, MONO has captivated audiences worldwide for over 25 years, earning them a reputation as one of the most compelling live acts in modern music. Special guest Bedless Bones.

Tickets are available via Piletilevi sales points and online.

Follow the event on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/events/989400039819875)!

Entry from the age of 7. We strongly recommend visitors under the age of 10 to wear hearing protection headphones.

**All ticket games, including on social media channels, are strictly prohibited without the written consent of the concert organizer!**
